2012130.name: Melobot - A Last Song Demo
2012130.description:
Immerse yourself in the dreamlike world of Melobot - A Last Song, an adventure, action, and rhythm game that thrusts you into a heroic quest to save a planet plagued by a strange disease. You play as Melobot, a lovable musical robot originally designed for peace, and awaken to a vital mission: revive the planet’s unique flora by recreating their songs and overcoming the challenges set by powerful guardians.

As you journey through colourful landscapes, unearth the hidden history of your planet, and explore stunning environments inspired by the art style of Pixar [and Ghibli, teeming with secrets to discover and challenges to overcome. But beware—your path is fraught with obstacles. Other mysterious mechanical beings are watching every move you do.

Your mission hinges on one powerful tool: music! Master a diverse set of instruments to breathe life into each region and gear up for intense showdowns with fierce Guardians in duels that will test your limits. Despite its small size and lack of combat programming, Melobot must find the courage and creativity to overcome these challenges. The fate of the planet rests in your hands, and only you can save it.

Let yourself be drawn into an emotional and captivating story, where every melody you play becomes a key weapon in bringing this world back to life.


  • Embark on an Adventure: Dive into vibrant landscapes filled with lush wildlife, unlock every corner of each region, and seek out the last remnants of humanity to uncover your story.
  • Unleash Your Inner Virtuoso: Master the art of music and combat in a race against time to recreate the melodies of the Meloplants and save their planet from the fearsome Guardians.
  • Be the Maestro of the Story: Immerse yourself in a rich narrative where the fate of humanity and an entire planetary ecosystem rests on your heroic deeds.
  • Marvel at Breathtaking Dreamscapes: Discover unique biomes in a sci-fi universe, inspired by the vibrant and enchanting visual styles of Pixar and Ghibli.
  • Engage in Pulse-Pounding Battles: Upgrade Melobot’s abilities and take on Guardians in intense duels that will push your skills to the limit!
  • A Game for Everyone: Embark on an adventure tailored to different skill levels, whether you’re a seasoned rhythm game veteran or a budding musical robot eager for contemplation and soothing melodies.
